arts.ttl: Cagliari vs. Venezia, a battle for safety
arts.sum: Cagliari have lost six of their last 10 Serie A home matches (W3 D1), including the two most recent; the last time the Rossoblù suffered three defeats on their own patch in a row in a single top-flight season was in April 2022. Cagliari have lost their last Serie A home game in four of their last five Serie A league campaigns (W1), after winning four of their previous five (L1); more generally, their last draw in such matches in the top-flight was back to 2010/11 (against Parma).

arts.ttl: Preview: Cagliari vs. Venezia - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Serie A clash between Cagliari and Venezia, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
